song_name: Girls Just Want To Have Fun
lyrics:
I come home, in the mornin' light
My mother says "when you gonna live your life right?"
"Oh momma, dear, we're not the fortunate ones"
And girls, they wanna have fun
Oh, girls just wanna have fun

The phone rings, in the middle of the night
My father yells "what you gonna do with your life?"
"Oh daddy, dear, you know you're still number one"
But girls, they wanna have fun
Oh, girls just wanna have

(That's all they really want, what I want)
(Some fun is what I want)
When the workin' day is done
Oh, girls, they wanna have fun
Oh, girls just wanna have fun
(Just wanna, just wanna)
(Just wanna), girls just wanna have fun

Some boys take a beautiful girl
And hide her away from the rest the rest the world
(I wanna be the one to walk in the sun)
Oh, girls, they wanna have fun
Oh, girls just wanna have

That's all they really want, what I want
Some fun is what I want
When the workin' day is done
Oh, girls, they wanna have fun
Oh, girls, just wanna have fun
(Just wanna, just wanna)
(Just wanna), girls just wanna have fun
(Just wanna, just wanna)
(Just wanna), girls just wanna have fun
(Just wanna, just wanna)
(Just wanna), girls just wanna have fun
(Just wanna, just wanna)
(Just wanna), girls just wanna have fun
